Test Name: Purkinje Cell Cytoplasmic Antibody, Type TR (PCA-TR) Titer, Spinal Fluid
Purpose: To detect and quantify PCA-TR antibodies in spinal fluid, aiding assessment of autoimmune activity against Purkinje cells in the central nervous system.
Equipment: Centrifuge; micro-pipettes and tips; incubator; ELISA reader or fluorescence microscope; glass slides and cover slips
